tit.cmt: 「Fushiminomiya Kuninari」 ⇒ 『Fushimi-no-miya Kuninari』に、他の親王名と統一をはかるために変更しました。

sen.j: 伏見宮邦尚親王（ふしみのみや くになりしんのう、元和 (日本)元年（1615年） - 承応2年11月29日 (旧暦)（1654年1月17日））は、江戸時代初期の皇族。
sen.e: Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kuninari (1615 - January 17, 1654) was a member of the Imperial family during the early Edo period.
Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Kuninari (1615 - January 17, 1654) was a member of the Imperial family who lived in the early Edo period.
sen.cmt: ・「Fushiminomiya Kuninari」 ⇒ 『Fushimi-no-miya Kuninari』に変更しました。・「the Imperial family during the early Edo period.」 → 『the Imperial family who lived in the early Edo period』と、他の親王表記との統一をはかるため変更しました。
sen.e: Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Kuninari (1615 - January 17, 1654) was a member of the Imperial family who lived in the early Edo period.
He was the eleventh head of the Fushiminomiya family.
He was the eleventh family head of the Fushimi-no-miya family.
sen.cmt: ・「the eleventh head」 → 『the eleventh family head』に、他の表記と統一させるため、変更しました。・「the Fushiminomiya family」 → 『the Fushimi-no-miya family』に他の表記と統一させるため、変更しました。
sen.e: He was the eleventh family head of the Fushimi-no-miya family.

sen.j: 伏見宮第10代当主伏見宮貞清親王第一王子。
sen.e: He was the first son of Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadakiyo who was the tenth head of the Fushiminomiya family.
He was the first son of Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Sadakiyo who was the tenth head of the Fushimi-no-miya family.
He was the first son of Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Sadakiyo who was the tenth head of the Fushimi-no-miya family.

sen.j: 母は豊臣秀吉養女（宇喜多秀家の女）。
sen.e: His mother was an adopted daughter of Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI (a daughter of Hideie UKITA).
sen.cmt: ウィキペディアのサイトでは、「母は前田利長養女」となっていました→http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%BC%8F%E8%A6%8B%E5%AE%AE%E9%82%A6%E5%B0%9A%E8%A6%AA%E7%8E%8B
sen.e: His mother was an adopted daughter of Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI (a daughter of Hideie UKITA).
His mother was an adopted daughter of Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI (a daughter of Hideie UKITA).
In 1626, he was given the title of Imperial Prince.
In 1626, he was given the title of Imperial Prince.
In 1626, he was given the title of Imperial Prince.

sen.j: 王子女はないとされるが、一説に伏見宮13代の伏見宮貞致親王が実子だと言う。
sen.e: It is thought that he had no child, but some people say that Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadayuki, the thirteenth head of the Fushiminomiya family, was his biological son.
It is thought that he had no child, but some people say that Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Sadayuki, the thirteenth head of the Fushimi-no-miya family, was his biological son.
It is thought that he had no child, but some people say that Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Sadayuki, the thirteenth head of the Fushimi-no-miya family, was his biological son.
